meanings.definition: Not separated or divided into different groups
meanings.sent1: The playground was unsegregated, allowing all children to play together.
meanings.sent2: The unsegregated seating arrangement in the classroom promoted inclusivity.
meanings.sent3: The unsegregated picnic blanket caused a mix-up when everyone sat in the wrong spots.
meanings.sent4: Her unsegregated approach to team assignments brought out the best in each member.
meanings.sent5: The unsegregated community event brought people from all walks of life together.

meanings.definition: Not isolated or kept apart from others
meanings.sent1: The unsegregated neighborhood fostered a strong sense of unity among residents.
meanings.sent2: The unsegregated work environment encouraged collaboration and teamwork.
meanings.sent3: The unsegregated lunch table led to unexpected friendships forming.
meanings.sent4: His unsegregated mindset allowed him to see the value in diverse perspectives.
meanings.sent5: The unsegregated music festival attracted a diverse crowd of music lovers.
